text: Ara yara kuphari kareche tara bale, 'amara e kura'anera opara kakhano imana anaba na ebam era age ya ache tate'o na.' Ara haya! Apani yadi dekhatena yalimaderake, yakhana tadera rabera samane damra karano habe, takhana tara paraspara bada-pratibada karate thakabe, yaderake durbala mane kara hata, tara ahankariderake balabe, 'tomara na thakale amara abasya'i mumina hatama
